results.content: Some great information about setting up Apache and Nginx servers, but course seems unfinished/copied from elsewhere. The final lecture for example is stating 'lets see you in the next lecture' as if there's more content which doesn't actually exist. Also quite a bit of duplication throughout (section 3 material has largely been covered in section 1 with a very small handful of extra info), and much of the course is copying and pasting commands which aren't always thoroughly talked through or explained. Makes it difficult to follow along as you have to keep going back and forth to read from the screen which command has been copied and pasted by the instructor, rather than hearing them read it out and explain it.
results.content_html: Some great information about setting up Apache and Nginx servers, but course seems unfinished/copied from elsewhere. The final lecture for example is stating 'lets see you in the next lecture' as if there's more content which doesn't actually exist. Also quite a bit of duplication throughout (section 3 material has largely been covered in section 1 with a very small handful of extra info), and much of the course is copying and pasting commands which aren't always thoroughly talked through or explained. Makes it difficult to follow along as you have to keep going back and forth to read from the screen which command has been copied and pasted by the instructor, rather than hearing them read it out and explain it.

the course instructor does not answer any of your questions. 
I messaged instructor 7 days back, still no reply from him.
I do not recommend the course.

response.content:
Hi Deekshith,
We are very sorry to hear you had a negative experience with our courses. We checked our Q&A section and it appears we responded to all your questions. The last message we sent was requesting information on which cloud hosting provider you are using. This would have helped us better assess your issue.
We look forward to hearing back from you. 
Kind Regards,
YouAccel

results.content:
The course is great, clear and with good explained examples, but I misses some chapter about:
- Setup like a reverse proxy  (in apache and nginx) serving webpages found in other nginx(s) (or others webservers). I know it should be something in virtualhosts, but id like to understand this aspect better.
- Use letsencrypt with a free DNS like duckdns.org. I don't have an account on digitalocean or godaddy I missing this aspect.
results.content_html:
The course is great, clear and with good explained examples, but I misses some chapter about:
- Setup like a reverse proxy (in apache and nginx) serving webpages found in other nginx(s) (or others webservers). I know it should be something in virtualhosts, but id like to understand this aspect better.
- Use letsencrypt with a free DNS like duckdns.org. I don't have an account on digitalocean or godaddy I missing this aspect.

results.content:
Die gebotenen Informationen sind eigentlich gut aufbereitet und gut präsentiert. Hier wären sicher mehr Sterne drinn gewesen, wenn es nicht einige Kritikpunkte gäbe:
1.) Es werden keine Zusatzmaterialien wie Kommdo-Referenzen/Downloads o. ä. angeboten. Wenn man die vorgestellten Kommandos anwenden möchte, muss man die Videos stoppen und abtippen. Das erscheint mir nicht sinnvoll zu sein.
2.) Auf Teilnehmeranfragen wird nicht adäquat reagiert. Relevante Inhalte Fehlen nachweislich.  Der Dozent könnte sie  sehr einfach nachreichen, reagiert aber auf entsprechende Hinweise nicht.
results.content_html:
Die gebotenen Informationen sind eigentlich gut aufbereitet und gut präsentiert. Hier wären sicher mehr Sterne drinn gewesen, wenn es nicht einige Kritikpunkte gäbe:

2.) Auf Teilnehmeranfragen wird nicht adäquat reagiert. Relevante Inhalte Fehlen nachweislich. Der Dozent könnte sie sehr einfach nachreichen, reagiert aber auf entsprechende Hinweise nicht.
